title: NASA Open Data Workshop Oct 14th
description: Open Source Science for Data Processing and Archives Workshop
contents:
Open Source Science for Data Processing and Archives Workshop
On October 14, 2021 from 12:00pm - 3:00pm ET, NASA will be holding a virtual workshop on the Open Source Science Initiative which is part of NASA’s Strategy for Data Management and Computing for Groundbreaking Science 2019-2024. The workshop will also introduce NASA’s Transform to Open Science (TOPS) initiative to help jump start the adoption of open science across NASA’s data communities. See the announcement for full details. Open to the public.

title: Inter-Agency R Users bi-monthly meeting
description: Video information is sent out via the email list.
contents: November 2021. Inter-Agency R Users bi-monthly meeting (Virtual)

title: Inter-Agency R Users bi-monthly meeting
description: The meeting will be held Sept 13 at 1pm EST. Video information is sent out via the email list.
contents: September 2021. Inter-Agency R Users bi-monthly meeting (Virtual)

title: R Workflow for Scientists
description: 1-hour workshops on Fridays in June and July 2021. Workshops on GitHub and R packages geared towards federal scientists.
contents: Website 1-hour workshops on Fridays in June and July 2021. Workshops on GitHub and R packages geared towards NOAA scientists and common work tasks, however material is applicable to scientists in general. The live WebEx sessions are restricted to NOAA staff (or anyone with .noaa email) due to WebEx limitations. However all material is public and online, including the recorded live sessions.

title: Government Advances in Statistical Programming workshop
description: Nov 6, 2020 A workshop focused on statistical programming for government applications across government and the private sector.
contents:
https://sites.google.com/view/gasp2020 A workshop focused on statistical programming for government applications across government and the private sector. Themes will include R and Python applications, data science, big data and official statistics, open source software, statistical computing software, and more.
October 15 abstracts are due.

title: BigSurv20
description: Virtual Nov-Dec 2020. BigSurv is an opportunity for social scientists, survey methodologists, statisticians and others with an interest in computer and data science to meet, interact, exchange ideas, collaborate, and learn from each other.
contents: https://www.bigsurv20.org This conference is open to all. BigSurv is an opportunity for computer and data scientists with an interest in social science and data collection and for social scientists, survey methodologists, statisticians and others with an interest in computer and data science to meet, interact, exchange ideas, collaborate, and learn from each other.

title: R for Social Scientists
description: Sept 22-24, 2020. virtual workshop by NOAA Fisheries social scientists. Focus on data analysis and advanced topics.
contents: Sept 22-24, 2020. 2020 R Workshop for Social Scientists virtual workshop by NOAA Fisheries social scientists. Focus on data analysis and advanced topics.
